column2: In  the  above  circumstances,  this  Court  is  of the  view that the  seizure  notices
'P31c'  have  been  issued  without following the  procedure  laid

column1: down  in  the  Municipal  Council  Ordinance.  The  Municipal  Commissioner  has
acted  ultra  vires  his  powers  by
column2:
issuing 
the  said  seizure  notices  without

column1: complying  with  Section  252(1}.  Hence,  this  Court  is  of the  view  that  the  said
seizure  notices are liable to be quashed  by a Writ of Certiorari.
